name: DEGA
description: DEGA simplifies blockchain game development with its AI-powered toolkit, DEGA Realms. The singular mission of DEGA is to democratize game development, empowering creators worldwide. DEGA Realms supports no-code game creation, account abstraction for easy onboarding, and custom in-game economies. The $DEGA token is deflationary, burning protocol fees to reduce supply over time. It can be staked for additional rewards, used for ecosystem transaction fees, in-game purchases, and various other utilities within the DEGA ecosystem.
